sections.description: This section analyzes the financial implications of purchasing chassis for EVG usage, considering factors like purchase price, MH percentage, CH rate, and terminal rate. It provides a summary of different options and their associated costs.
sections.notes: Assumptions include chassis age, EVG usage, transition to MH, market rate for MH, and terminal usage billing.

sections.description: This section lists the key assumptions used in the EVG Chassis Purchase Analysis. These assumptions are critical for understanding the context and limitations of the analysis.
sections.notes: These assumptions are explicitly stated to provide transparency and allow for sensitivity analysis.
